resources.string: "This app was made possible with the combined efforts of group 4:\nPaolo T. Inocencion, Manoj Subedi, Zaid Alanazi and Ahmed Almatar."

"Photos of flags were taken from www.crossed-flag-pins.com. \nFlags animated in this app were gifs, then converted into .mp4 video for pixel size consistency using www.online-convert.com, \nthen separated frame by frame with the use of www.ezgif.com."
"National anthem audio files were downloaded free from www.junglevibe1.net, \nand were splitted and edtited to reduced the size and duration using www.mp3cut.net."
Bulk file renaming and numbering was made easy using the program Bulk Rename Utilily and ItelliJ Community Edition IDE to generate xml sequence lines of codes.
Sources of ideas and codes include www.developers.android.com, www.stackoverflow.com, and www.youtube.com
